overview: It's girl's night, Palm Springs style! We headed to the desert for some rug munching and relaxation. I brought along two new girls, Bobbie and Jeanie. They're both 18 and love to eat box. Before the end of the night they had all the girls begging for a turn. It was Eva who really got the girls wet. She's an amazing squirter, who not only drenched the bed, but also made Salena squirt. Come along and see what really happens on girls night...
title: Slumber Party 8
